text.en: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Manadome" monster or 1 "Visas Starfrost" from your Deck to your hand. LIGHT monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each Tuner you control and in your GY. If a face-up Tuner(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Primal Planet Kalarium" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Primal Planet Kalarium" per turn.
